user.title: 🎵 Add WiiM Speaker
user.description: Enter your WiiM device's IP address. You can find this in your router's admin panel or the WiiM Home app under Device Settings → Network Info.

upnp.title: Select WiiM Speaker
upnp.description: Choose a speaker from the discovered devices, or configure manually.

confirm.title: Confirm Setup
confirm.description: Confirm adding this WiiM speaker to Home Assistant.

abort.already_configured: This WiiM device is already configured in Home Assistant

error.no_host: Please enter a valid IP address
error.cannot_connect: ❌ Connection failed. Please check that the IP address is correct and your WiiM device is powered on and connected to the same network as Home Assistant.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again or check the Home Assistant logs for details.

data_description.playing_update_rate: Fast polling when music is playing for smooth position updates (1-5 seconds)
data_description.idle_update_rate: Slower polling when not playing for efficiency (5-60 seconds)
data_description.volume_step_percent: Volume change amount when using volume up/down buttons (1-50%). Smaller steps provide finer control.
data_description.enable_maintenance_buttons: Show device maintenance buttons (reboot, sync time) for troubleshooting
data_description.enable_diagnostic_entities: Show advanced diagnostic sensors for debugging and performance monitoring
data_description.debug_logging: Enable detailed logging for troubleshooting. Recommended only when experiencing issues.
